title: Great Zimbabwe
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,165 words, Level U (Grade 4), Lexile 990L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     L and Z1
description: The massive stone ruins of Great Zimbabwe, a once-thriving city in East Africa, present many mysteries, including questions surrounding the functions of its well-constructed walls and buildings. Readers learn possible answers to these questions and about the remarkable building techniques used in the city.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
